name: 3. MemoCube
description:
My Third Game

MemoCube is my take on the classic Concentration (Match 'Em) game.

I was doing the memory game tutorial from the "Unity in Action" book and I thought, this could also work in 3D. That’s how this game was born.

I’ve been playing video games since I was 5. Now that I’m past 30, I decided to learn game development and make my own games as a hobby.

Follow my progress on Twitter @Levi_Berciu
